welcome: Welcome to Our Online Bidding System
intro: Experience the thrill of competitive bidding with our cutting-edge platform. Join live auctions, place your bids, and win extraordinary items—all from the comfort of your home.

features.live_desc: Participate in real-time auctions happening now and place your bids instantly.
features.strategize_desc: Preview and prepare for auctions to strategize your bidding approach.
features.manage_desc: Effortlessly create, edit, and oversee your auction items with our intuitive tools.

steps.signup_desc: Create a free account in just a few seconds.
steps.bid_desc: Participate in live auctions and place your offers.
steps.win_desc: Win unique items and enjoy your victories!
